going.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: the difficulty or speed with which something is done
going.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: I’m getting the work done, but it’s slow going.
We climbed the mountain in three hours, which wasn’t bad going.
going.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: the act of leaving a place
going.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: His going will be no great loss to the company.
going.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: Are there any jobs going where you work?
going.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: used after words such as cinema and theatre to form adjectives that describe people who regularly go to the cinema, theatre etc
going.translation[2].definitions[0].defi: the usual amount you pay or receive for something at this particular time
going.translation[2].definitions[0].exam: They offered me the going rate for the job.
